冬不拉.definition: Dombra or Tambura, Kazakh plucked lute

冬令時.definition: standard time (as opposed to daylight saving time 夏令時|夏令时[xia4 ling4 shi2])

冬字頭.definition: name of "walk slowly" component 夂[zhi3] in Chinese characters

冬山.definition: Dongshan or Tungshan Township in Yilan County 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 Xian4], Taiwan

冬山鄉.definition: Dongshan or Tungshan Township in Yilan County 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 Xian4], Taiwan

冬瓜.definition: wax gourd (Cucurbitaceae, Benincasa hispida); white gourd; white hairy melon; Chinese squash

冬病夏治.definition: to treat winter diseases in the summer (TCM)

冬筍.definition: winter bamboo shoots (smaller and tenderer as a result of being dug out before they come out of the soil)

冬至.definition: Winter Solstice, 22nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 22nd December-5th January

冬菇.definition: donko shiitake mushroom, a prized type of shiitake (Lentinula edodes) cultivated in winter, with thick flesh and partially open cap

冬菜.definition: preserved dried cabbage or mustard greens

冬蟲夏草.definition: caterpillar fungus (Ophiocordyceps sinensis) (The fungus grows within the body of a caterpillar, culminating in the emergence of a stalked fruiting body from the caterpillar's head, and is a much-prized and expensive ingredient used as a tonic in traditional Chinese medicine.)

冬陰功.definition: variant of 冬蔭功|冬荫功[dong1yin1gong1]
